plugins.name: QQT Random Number Generator
plugins.description:
This is a Figma plugin that replaces selected text with randomly generated numbers. It supports both Chinese and English language interfaces, has a clear visual hierarchy, and is simple and intuitive to operate.

Functional Features

1. Range Setting: You can set the minimum and maximum values of the random numbers (e.g., 20 - 50).

2. Decimal Place Setting: You can set the number of digits after the decimal point.

3. Thousand Separator Display: You can choose whether to insert a thousand separator in the number.

4. Custom Prefix and Suffix: You can add custom prefixes and suffixes, such as +, -, %, HKD, ¥, etc.

5. Chinese - English Switch: It supports quick switching between Chinese and English interfaces.


这是一个Figma插件，用于将选中的文本替换为随机生成的数字。支持中英文双语界面，视觉层次分明，操作简单直观。

功能特点

1. 区间设定：可以设置随机数字的最小值和最大值（例如20～50）

2. 小数位设置：可以设置小数点后的位数

3. 千分位显示：可以选择是否在数字中插入千分位分隔符

4. 自定义前后缀：可以添加自定义前缀和后缀，如+、-、%、HKD、¥等

5. 中英文切换：支持中英文界面快速切换
plugins.tagline: This is a Figma plugin that replaces selected text with randomly generated numbers.

plugins.name: Frames to Pages
plugins.description:
✨ About the Plugin


Organize your Figma files more efficiently!


This plugin moves each selected frame into its own new page automatically, helping you:


  1. Improve performance on heavy files.
  2. Make navigation faster and more intuitive.
  3. Keep versions and project sections clearly separated.


Perfect for large projects, collaborative teams, and anyone who values a clean and structured workspace.


💡 Why use this plugin?


As Figma projects grow, pages often become crowded with dozens (or hundreds) of frames.

This can cause:


  1. Slower loading times.
  2. Harder navigation and confusion for new collaborators.
  3. Increased risk of overwriting or losing important work.


By splitting frames into separate pages, your file becomes lighter, faster, and easier to maintain.


📚 Common Use Cases


  1. Large projects: Quickly organize dozens of screens into individual pages.


  1. Version management: Save different design versions separately without cluttering a single page.


  1. Developer handoff: Share organized sections with developers more easily.


  1. Team collaboration: Help new team members find what they need faster.


🛠️ How it works


  1. Select the frames you want to organize.
  2. Run the plugin.
  3. Choose whether to delete the original page or keep it.


Each selected frame will be placed into a brand new page, keeping its content intact.
plugins.tagline: Move each selected frame into its own new page automatically. Organize your Figma files easily.

plugins.name: Figma to osu!framework
plugins.description:
A third-party plugin to convert Figma elements to osu!framework code


Supported features:

  1. Basic layout (RelativeSizeAxes, Anchor/Orign, Padding, etc.)
  2. Converting cornerRadius to masking containers
  3. Linear Gradients (Both simple as well as multi-stop gradients work as long as they're horizontal or vertical)
  4. Text (Only one style per text element supported)

plugins.name: Badenova Design System Sync
plugins.description:
This plugin synchronizes your Figma tokens with the Badenova Design System


Usage:

You need to provide a valid GitHub token to synchronize your Figma tokens.

To obtain a GitHub token, contact christoph.hummel@badenova.de or generate your own token.


If you have a valid GitHub token, enter it into the respective input field and press Save.

Then, click the Sync Badenova Design-Tokens button.

If the synchronization is successful, you will receive a confirmation message.
plugins.tagline: Synchronize your Figma tokens with the Badenova Design System

plugins.name: Namer | Неймер
plugins.description:
Namer renames selected frames based on their position (top-to-bottom, left-to-right) on the canvas, ignoring layer hierarchy. Adds sequential numbers with your custom prefix: Prefix_1, Prefix_2, etc.


Неймер переименовывает выбранные фреймы по их расположению на рабочей области (сверху-вниз, слева-направо), игнорируя иерархию слоев. Добавляет порядковые номера с вашим префиксом: Префикс_1, Префикс_2 и т.д.


How to Use / Как использовать:

  1. Select frames → Open plugin → Click "Переименовать".
  2. Выберите фреймы → Запустите плагин → Нажмите «Переименовать».
plugins.tagline: Rename frames by position, not layers. / Переименовывает фреймы по расположению, а не слоям.

plugins.name: Component repeater
plugins.description:
# Component Repeater


A Figma plugin that helps you create components from repeated elements while preserving variations in styles, text, and images.


## What it does


This plugin analyzes your selection and creates a component that intelligently handles:


- Style variations (colors, effects, layout properties)

- Text content variations

- Image variations


When you have multiple similar elements that differ in styles or content, this plugin will:


1. Create a main component with variants for different styles

2. Create a separate component set for image variations

3. Replace all selected elements with instances of the component

4. Preserve the original text content and image placement


## How to use it


1. **Select similar elements**


- Select two or more groups or frames that have the same structure

- The plugin has a feature to help you find all similar elements from one selected node

- The elements can have different styles, text content, or images but should have the same layer structure


2. **Run the plugin**


- The plugin will analyze your selection and show variations in:

- Text content

- Colors and effects

- Images

- Layout properties


3. **Create the component**


- Click "Replace selection with a component"

- The plugin will create:

- A main component with style variants (if variations exist)

- A separate image component set (if images are used)

- Instances that preserve the original variations


4. **Finding similar elements**

- Select a single element

- Click "Find Similar Nodes" to select all elements with the same structure

- Use this to find more elements to include for replacement


## Tips


- The plugin works best with elements that have the same structure (same hierarchy of layers)

- Style variations are automatically detected and turned into variants

- Text content is preserved in each instance

- Images are turned into a swappable component

- Use the resize handle in the bottom right to adjust the plugin window size


## Requirements


- Works with groups and frames

- Selected elements must have the same layer structure

- Supports both direct images and image fills
plugins.tagline: Create components from repeated elements while preserving variations in styles, text, and images

111831.name: Component repeater

plugins.name: The Ultimate Table
plugins.description:
The Ultimate Table is a powerful Figma plugin that enables you to create reusable, fully customizable tables with draggable rows and columns.


Features

  1. Rearrange, remove, add, or duplicate columns and rows
  2. Drag to adjust column widths in header cells
  3. Automatic row height adjustment based on content
  4. Maintain linked tables across your design


Styling Options

  1. Customizable padding, margins, and borders
  2. Column text alignment controls
  3. Zebra striping support
  4. Header styling with sort/filter/search indicators
  5. Custom border radius
  6. Flexible font and size options


Smart Updates

  1. Master table controls for consistent styling


Need a quick start?

  1. Learn all there is to know in less than 10 minutes in this video tutorial
  2. Complete tutorial (Written & Video) at ultimate-table.com
plugins.tagline: Finally a plugin to create reusable, fully customizable tables with draggable rows and columns.

plugins.name: Components to Section
plugins.description:
Easily regroup all your master components into a section. Runs across all pages of your file

Plugin does not have UI to run.


How to use

Launch via cmd + / or go to plugin > Component to Section

Tab and choose

  1. Run on current page
  2. Run on all pages
  3. Set preferences


Preferences (User saved)

  1. Choose where to create the section (current page or new page)
  2. Choose the spacing between regrouped components


Why paid?

I'm a hobbyist and it's very difficult to write clean efficient code.

I have a day job and it's a good way to keep me motivated and work extra hours.

$2 is the cheapest a plugin can be sold on figma, I was happy with $0.99 but hey...


If this plugin starts selling regularly I will keep adding commands to make it even more powerful


Free stuff

If you are looking for free stuff, I have published two widget and they are currently used by more than 50K users


Help out ?

I'm in the London, UK and always keen to hear about fellow hackers, If you want to contribute to the plugin or have a suggestion feel free to contact me on edwardbattistini.com/contact

accepted.name: EdwardB
accepted.description: Product designer during the day. Super dad at night

plugins.tagline: Regroup all your master components to a section

plugins.name: json数据转设计稿 json to Frame
plugins.description:
Introduction

This plugin allows users to quickly create Figma elements by inputting JSON data, improving workflow efficiency.


Function Description

  1. Generate Figma elements through JSON input
  2. Multi-language user interface support
  3. Compatible with multi-layered frame structures
  4. Can be used together with the plugin Export Frame JSON Pro for seamless frame export and import.


How to Use

  1. Open the plugin interface and select the appropriate language.
  2. Enter or paste valid JSON data into the JSON input field.
  3. Click the “Submit JSON” button, and the plugin will generate corresponding Figma elements based on the input data.


Important Notes

  1. Ensure the JSON data is correctly formatted, or elements may not be generated properly.
  2. This plugin can be used together with Export Frame JSON Pro for quick frame import and export.


介绍

本插件允许用户通过输入 JSON 数据，快速生成 Figma 画板中的元素，提升设计工作效率。


功能说明

  1. 通过 JSON 输入生成 Figma 元素
  2. 支持多种语言的用户界面
  3. 兼容画板的多层次结构
  4. 支持与【画板 JSON 导出(专业版) Export Frame JSON Pro】插件配合使用，轻松实现画板导出与导入的无缝对接。


使用方法

  1. 打开插件界面，选择适合的语言。
  2. 在 JSON 输入框中输入或粘贴有效的 JSON 数据。
  3. 点击“提交 JSON”按钮，插件将根据输入的数据生成对应的 Figma 元素。


注意事项

  1. 确保输入的 JSON 数据格式正确，否则可能无法生成元素。
  2. 该插件支持与【画板 JSON 导出(专业版) Export Frame JSON Pro】插件一起使用，实现画板的快速导入导出。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Easily create Figma frames from JSON data input.

136421.name: json数据转设计稿 json to Frame
136421.description:
Introduction

This plugin allows users to quickly create Figma elements by inputting JSON data, improving workflow efficiency.


Function Description

  1. Generate Figma elements through JSON input
  2. Multi-language user interface support
  3. Compatible with multi-layered frame structures
  4. Can be used together with the plugin Export Frame JSON Pro for seamless frame export and import.


How to Use

  1. Open the plugin interface and select the appropriate language.
  2. Enter or paste valid JSON data into the JSON input field.
  3. Click the “Submit JSON” button, and the plugin will generate corresponding Figma elements based on the input data.


Important Notes

  1. Ensure the JSON data is correctly formatted, or elements may not be generated properly.
  2. This plugin can be used together with Export Frame JSON Pro for quick frame import and export.


介绍

本插件允许用户通过输入 JSON 数据，快速生成 Figma 画板中的元素，提升设计工作效率。


功能说明

  1. 通过 JSON 输入生成 Figma 元素
  2. 支持多种语言的用户界面
  3. 兼容画板的多层次结构
  4. 支持与【画板 JSON 导出(专业版) Export Frame JSON Pro】插件配合使用，轻松实现画板导出与导入的无缝对接。


使用方法

  1. 打开插件界面，选择适合的语言。
  2. 在 JSON 输入框中输入或粘贴有效的 JSON 数据。
  3. 点击“提交 JSON”按钮，插件将根据输入的数据生成对应的 Figma 元素。


注意事项

  1. 确保输入的 JSON 数据格式正确，否则可能无法生成元素。
  2. 该插件支持与【画板 JSON 导出(专业版) Export Frame JSON Pro】插件一起使用，实现画板的快速导入导出。

manifest.name: json数据转设计稿 json to Frame

136421.tagline: Easily create Figma frames from JSON data input.

plugins.name: 一键翻译元素 Quick Translate
plugins.description:
Introduction

Quick Translate is a Figma plugin designed to help you instantly translate selected text elements into different languages with just one click. Save time and improve your workflow by translating text directly within your design files.


Function Description

  1. Translate selected text elements into a specified target language.
  2. Supports multiple languages and automatic translation of all text layers in a Figma selection.
  3. Easy-to-use interface to select languages and apply translations quickly.
  4. Ideal for designers working on multilingual projects or collaborating with global teams.


How to Use

  1. Select one or more text elements in your Figma file.
  2. Open the plugin from the "Plugins" menu.
  3. Choose the target language for translation.
  4. Click the "Translate" button, and the selected text will be replaced with the translated version.


Notes

  1. Ensure your Figma selection includes text elements, as the plugin only works with text layers.
  2. The translation may vary depending on the accuracy of the API and the language selected.
  3. For optimal results, select only relevant text elements to avoid unnecessary API calls.


介绍

Quick Translate 是一款 Figma 插件，旨在帮助您一键翻译选中的文本元素。通过该插件，您可以直接在 Figma 文件中将文本翻译为不同语言，节省时间，提高工作效率。


功能说明

  1. 将选中的文本元素翻译为指定的目标语言。
  2. 支持多种语言，并自动翻译 Figma 选择中的所有文本图层。
  3. 提供简单易用的界面，可以快速选择语言并应用翻译。
  4. 适用于多语言项目的设计师，或者与全球团队协作的设计师。


使用方法

  1. 在 Figma 文件中选择一个或多个文本元素。
  2. 从“插件”菜单打开插件。
  3. 选择目标翻译语言。
  4. 点击“翻译”按钮，选中的文本将被翻译并替换。


注意事项

  1. 请确保您的 Figma 选择包含文本元素，因为插件只支持文本图层。
  2. 翻译效果可能会根据 API 的准确性和所选语言有所不同。
  3. 为了获得最佳效果，建议只选择相关的文本元素，以避免不必要的 API 请求。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Quick Translate: Instant Translation for Figma Elements

plugins.name: 路径文字 Path Text Aligner
plugins.description:
Introduction

Path Text Aligner is a Figma plugin that allows users to easily align text along any custom path, providing more flexibility and control over text placement in your design.


Function Description

  1. Aligns selected text to any vector path or shape.
  2. Adjusts text along curves, straight lines, and complex paths.
  3. Offers controls for offset and spacing to fine-tune text positioning.
  4. Supports multi-line text alignment along a path.


How to Use

  1. Select the text you want to align.
  2. Draw or select the path you want the text to follow.
  3. Run the plugin, and the text will automatically align to the path.
  4. Adjust settings for text spacing, direction, and offset to achieve the desired effect.


Notes

  1. This plugin works best with vector paths (e.g., lines or shapes).
  2. Ensure the text layer is not grouped with other objects for proper alignment.
  3. You may need to adjust font size or path curvature for optimal results.


介绍

路径文字（Path Text Aligner）是一个Figma插件，允许用户轻松地将文字沿自定义路径对齐，在设计中提供更多的灵活性和控制。


功能说明

  1. 将选中的文字沿任意矢量路径或形状对齐。
  2. 支持文本在曲线、直线及复杂路径上的对齐。
  3. 提供偏移和间距控制，以微调文本的位置。
  4. 支持沿路径对齐多行文本。


使用方法

  1. 选择要对齐的文字。
  2. 绘制或选择要让文字跟随的路径。
  3. 启动插件，文字将自动沿路径对齐。
  4. 调整文本间距、方向和偏移设置，以获得理想效果。


注意事项

  1. 此插件适用于矢量路径（例如，线条或形状）。
  2. 请确保文字图层未与其他对象组合，以确保正确对齐。
  3. 根据路径曲率和字体大小调整设置，以获得最佳效果。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Align text along any path with ease in Figma.

plugins.name: 画板自动编号 Auto Artboard Numbering
plugins.description:
Introduction

This plugin automates the numbering of selected Figma artboards, allowing you to customize the naming sequence with prefixes and suffixes. It supports multiple languages, enhancing your workflow efficiency and organization.


Function Introduction

  1. Automatically numbers selected artboards in Figma.
  2. Customizable naming with prefixes and suffixes.
  3. Supports multiple languages.
  4. Two naming sequences: left-to-right then top-to-bottom, or top-to-bottom then left-to-right.


How to Use

  1. Select the artboards you want to rename.
  2. Choose your preferred naming sequence.
  3. Optionally, add a prefix or suffix.
  4. Click "Apply Naming" to rename the selected artboards.


Notes

  1. Ensure artboards are selected before applying the naming operation.
  2. The plugin temporarily disables the apply button for 2 seconds to prevent accidental multiple clicks.


介绍

本插件自动为选中的 Figma 画板编号，支持添加前缀和后缀的自定义命名顺序。支持多种语言，提升您的工作效率和画板管理。


功能说明

  1. 自动为选中的 Figma 画板编号。
  2. 支持添加前缀和后缀的自定义命名。
  3. 支持多种语言。
  4. 两种命名顺序：从左到右再从上到下，或从上到下再从左到右。


使用方法

  1. 选择需要重新命名的画板。
  2. 选择您喜欢的命名顺序。
  3. 可选地添加前缀或后缀。
  4. 点击“应用命名”重新命名选中的画板。


注意事项

  1. 请确保在应用命名操作前已选中画板。
  2. 插件会在2秒内暂时禁用应用按钮，以防止意外的多次点击。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: Automate artboard numbering with custom prefixes, suffixes, and multi-language support in Figma.

plugins.name: Design to Wireframe Converter
plugins.description:
Skipped wireframes and dove headfirst into pixel-perfect designs?

Now your PM’s asking, “Where are the wireframes?” Or maybe your case study’s looking a little too polished? No sweat, turn your beautiful designs into wireframes with a click.


For best results, avoid overly nested layers and use clear, descriptive names, like Button, Vector, or Icon, to keep things organized and easy to convert.
plugins.tagline: Convert your designs into wireframes in a single click

plugins.name: Color Palette Extractor
plugins.description:
Easily audit and document your color palette. This plugin scans any selection, extracts all solid colors and gradients, and lists them with their official Variable or Style name.

Get instant access to HEX (with alpha), RGBA and HLS codes, and export the entire list to an HTML file, perfect for creating style guides and improving developer handoff.
plugins.tagline: Extracts colors, codes, and names from your selection. Lets you export the palette to HTML

136609.tagline: Extracts colors, codes, and names from your selection. Lets you export the palette to HTML

plugins.name: Size Snap
plugins.description: Size Snap instantly aligns your designs to a consistent grid by rounding the width and height of any selected layers—and their children—to a chosen multiple. Whether you pick one of the built-in presets (8, 16, 24, etc.) or enter your own custom value, Size Snap ensures every element snaps to clean, pixel-perfect dimensions.
plugins.tagline: Resize any component and its children to fit a given grid

136532.name: Size Snap
136532.description: Size Snap instantly aligns your designs to a consistent grid by rounding the width and height of any selected layers—and their children—to a chosen multiple. plugins.name: CopySpark - AI Copywriter
plugins.description:
CopySpark – is an AI-powered Figma plugin built for designers. Powered by ChatGPT and Gemini, it helps you write clear, effective UX copy without leaving your canvas.


✨ Easily write new content from scratch.

🔁 Instantly generate alternative versions.

⚡ Work faster with AI instructions tailored to your tone and context.


Say goodbye to blank text boxes — let AI help you craft and iterate copy in seconds!


How to Use

  1. Choose your AI model – ChatGPT or Gemini.
  2. Enter your API key for the selected model.
  3. Select a text layer in your Figma file.
  4. Choose whether to generate alternatives for the selected text or write new copy from a prompt.
  5. Click “Go” to generate options, then click the version you like to insert it into your text layer.


Get Gemini API Key

Get ChatGPT API Key
plugins.tagline: AI copywriting powered by ChatGPT & Gemini! Write and iterate with ease!

plugins.name: GIF Boss
plugins.description:
Bring your designs to life with GIF Boss — the ultimate Figma plugin for creating powerful, customisable GIFs in seconds. Select a series of frames and transform them into smooth, high-quality animations with full control over:

  1. Timing & Looping – Set frame durations and loop styles with ease
  2. Reordering – Drag and drop to perfect your frame sequence
  3. Optimisation – Shrink file sizes without compromising quality
  4. Bulk Creation – Generate several GIFs simultaneously. Ideal for large campaign roll-outs with multiple animated banner ads of different dimensions
plugins.tagline: Simultaneous multi GIF generation.

136516.description:

  2. Reordering – Drag and drop to perfect your frame sequence
  3. Optimisation – Shrink file sizes without compromising quality
  4. Bulk Creation – Generate several GIFs simultaneously. Ideal for large campaign roll-outs with multiple animated banner ads of different dimensions

plugins.name: Flag Insert Plugin
plugins.description:
Insert beautifully crafted country flags directly into your Figma designs with one click.


FlagPack SVG makes it easy to browse, search, and insert high-quality SVG flags into your design projects. Simply search for a country name, click on the flag, and it appears right on your canvas—ready to scale, customize, or use as-is.


How to Use:


  1. Open the plugin in Figma.


  1. Use the search bar to find a specific flag.


  1. Click on any flag to insert it into your current page.


Done!


Ideal for UI mockups, dashboards, internationalization features, and travel apps.
plugins.tagline: Drop any country flag into your design in seconds

  1. Open the plugin in Figma.


  1. Use the search bar to find a specific flag.


  1. Click on any flag to insert it into your current page.


Done!


Ideal for UI mockups, dashboards, internationalization features, and travel apps.
136702.tagline: Drop any country flag into your design in seconds

plugins.name: Iconize
plugins.description:
Transform any Figma design into a complete set of perfectly scaled Chrome extension icons in seconds.


Benefits:

  1. Save hours of manual work - No more tedious resizing and exporting
  2. Perfect proportions - Maintains design integrity across all sizes
  3. Professional results - Vector paths, text, and effects scale beautifully
  4. Chrome extension ready - Standard sizes (16px, 24px, 36px, 48px, 128px)
  5. Batch processing - Handle multiple designs simultaneously


How to use:

  1. Select your design - Choose any frame, group, component, or instance
  2. Run Iconize - Go to Plugins → Iconize → Scale to Icon Sizes
  3. Get your icons - Five perfectly scaled versions appear instantly
  4. Export to PNG / SVG and use - Icons are named icon16, icon24, icon36, icon48, icon128


Perfect for Chrome extensions, web apps, mobile apps, and any project requiring multiple icon sizes. Works with complex designs including vectors, text, effects, and nested elements.

accepted.name: George Valdes
accepted.description:
Post-architect
I like building, marketing, and selling outcomes

Iconize - Figma Plugin
Zenfiller - Auto Form filler
Zensets - Context engine

plugins.tagline: Instantly generate size appropriate icons at 16px, 24px, 36px, 48px & 128px from any design

plugins.name: Mysa Smart Table
plugins.description:
Mysa Smart Table helps design teams, founders, and PMs quickly create clean, UI-aligned tables— customised to their workflow with the right column order for any module or tab.


Built on the Mysa Design System, each row is styled using consistent, production-ready components, ensuring a unified experience across all designs. The underlying data remains constant across variations, supporting seamless collaboration and iteration.


We’ve also introduced a powerful new “Create New” section, where you can choose from the existing columns and build custom tables from scratch — perfect for fast design exploration and iteration.
plugins.tagline: Generate responsive tables instantly using Mysa components

136840.name: Mysa Smart Table
136840.description:
Mysa Smart Table helps design teams, founders, and PMs quickly create clean, UI-aligned tables— customised to their workflow with the right column order for any module or tab.


Built on the Mysa Design System, each row is styled using consistent, production-ready components, ensuring a unified experience across all designs. The underlying data remains constant across variations, supporting seamless collaboration and iteration.


We’ve also introduced a powerful new “Create New” section, where you can choose from the existing columns and build custom tables from scratch — perfect for fast design exploration and iteration.
136840.tagline: Generate responsive tables instantly using Mysa components

plugins.name: Frame Select Helper
plugins.description:
Supports repeatedly selecting the same group of frames by adding a mark (frame name suffix) to the selected frames.


If you copy and paste the selected frames from this tool onto another page, you can export only the targeted frames to a single PDF file by clicking “File” -> “Export frames to PDF”!


選択したフレームにマーク（フレーム名の接尾辞）を付けて、繰り返し同じフレーム群を選択することをサポートします。

このツールで選択したフレームを、コピーして別ページにペーストすると、「ファイル」→「フレームをPDFにエクスポート」で狙ったフレームだけ単一PDFに書き出せます。


使い方

初回：選択対象にしたいフレームをマークする


Figmaのフレーム名に`--sfh-target`を付与する

これは手動で、またはフレームを選択した状態でプラグインを起動して"選択フレームを対象にマーク"を押すことで行う


2回目以降：フレームを一括選択する

  1. プラグインを起動する
  2. "すべて選択・解除"を押すと、マークしたフレームがすべて選択される


このツールで選択したフレームを、コピーして別ページにペーストすると、「ファイル」→「フレームをPDFにエクスポート」で狙ったフレームだけ単一PDFに書き出せます
plugins.tagline: Selection helper for those who want to repeatedly select the same frame for PDF export, etc.

plugins.name: Variable detacher and converter
plugins.description:
Detacher – Take Full Control Over Figma Variables

Tired of wasting time manually detaching variables? Detacher is your all-in-one solution to quickly scan, preview, and detach variables from your selection — with full control and confidence.


✅ What Makes Detacher Better?


Visual Variable Summary

Instantly see how many variables (Colors, Text, Numbers, Others) exist in your selection, with a live count and total — at a glance.


Smart Selection Control

Choose exactly what you want to detach — Colors, Text, Numbers, Others, or Typography — using simple checkboxes.


Typography Variable Support

Detach all typography-related variables, including mixed styles and both string & number-based properties (like font size, line height, letter spacing, paragraph spacing, and indent).


Preview Before Detach 🛡️

Optional “Preview Changes” mode lets you review exactly what’s about to change — no accidental detaching, no surprises.


One-click Detach

Once you're ready, just hit the Detach Variables button and move on. No friction, no bloated UI, no hidden steps.


⚙️ How It Works

  1. Select your frame, group, or section.
  2. Launch the plugin.
  3. Pick the variable types you want to detach.
  4. Preview (optional) → Confirm → Done.


https://buymeacoffee.com/habeebrahman


Future-Proof & Community-Focused

We're continuously testing new scenarios, but bugs can happen — so please send your feedback 🙏

Exciting features are already in the pipeline!
plugins.tagline: Detach differnet types of variables in a frame effortlessly !

plugins.name: ProtoFlow – Offline Clickable Prototypes
plugins.description:
💡 Cos'è ProtoFlow?

ProtoFlow è un plugin gratuito per Figma che ti permette di esportare un prototipo interattivo cliccabile in locale, in formato HTML + PNG. Nessun hosting, nessuna connessione internet necessaria. Basta un browser.


Perfetto per:


Test utente su dispositivi embedded


Demo da inviare ai clienti


Presentazioni offline


Contesti in cui Figma non è accessibile


🚀 Come funziona


Seleziona uno o più frame da esportare.


Scegli il frame di partenza.


Risolvi eventuali errori o warning.


Clicca “Scarica prototipo”.


Viene generato un archivio .zip con:


start.html: il file principale da aprire in locale


screens/: la cartella con tutte le schermate e i file HTML


README.txt: guida completa all’utilizzo


🧠 Come sono gestite le interazioni?


Ogni collegamento tra frame in Figma diventa un link cliccabile nella pagina HTML.


Gli elementi con Navigate To + Instant vengono interpretati come hotspot.


Anche un’intera schermata può essere interattiva.


📦 Cosa contiene il file ZIP?


start.html: la pagina iniziale del prototipo


screens/: tutte le schermate in PNG + HTML per ogni frame


README.txt: istruzioni complete all’uso, anche per utenti non tecnici


⚠️ Importante: non rinominare o spostare screens/, né i file .html o .png, altrimenti i collegamenti si romperanno.


📘 Istruzioni integrate

Nel tab "Istruzioni" del plugin trovi una guida dettagliata. Puoi anche consultare il file README.txt incluso nell’archivio per avere una versione offline, utile da condividere con il tuo team o clienti.


🔐 Nessun dato viene inviato online.

Tutto il processo avviene localmente nel tuo browser. Le immagini e i file generati non lasciano mai il tuo computer.


👨‍💻 Creato da

Francesco Cerisano (Havas Milan)
plugins.tagline: Esporta prototipi cliccabili offline da Figma in HTML+PNG. Perfetto per test e demo
